briefdescription.para: PRIVATE FUNCTION - Store the current NVS (Non-Volatile Storage) version if needed.

detaileddescription.para: This function ensures that the storage version recorded in NVS is consistent with the current API's storage version.

listitem.para: If the stored version matches the current version, nothing is done.
If no version exists in NVS (first use), it writes the current version into NVS.
If a different version exists, it treats the mismatch as an error and signals that manual clearing is required.

simplesect.para: 0 if version is already correct or successfully written, -1 on failure.

briefdescription.para: PRIVATE FUNCTION - Initialize the NVS (Non-Volatile Storage) subsystem.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets up the flash storage environment used to store ADC parameters.

listitem.para: Verifies if initialization has already been completed.
Checks if the flash device is ready for operations.
Retrieves flash page information to determine sector size and count.
Checks and validates the stored version against the current module version.

simplesect.para: 0 if initialization succeeds, -1 if initialization fails, -2 if a version mismatch is detected.

inbodydescription.para: Handle non volatile memory used to store ADC parameters Flash partition reserved to user data storage is 4kB long We have to mount the file system then we extract one memory page that is 2kB long that contains the data and read the relevant addresses to init ADC parameters.

briefdescription.para: Store a data item in non-volatile storage (NVS).

detaileddescription.para: Stores a block of data under a given identifier (data_id) in flash memory.
If the data already exists, it is overwritten. Useful for persisting configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the data to be stored.
Size of the data in bytes.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, negative value on error.

briefdescription.para: Retrieve a data item from non-volatile storage (NVS).

detaileddescription.para: Reads the stored data associated with the given identifier (data_id) and copies it into the provided buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the buffer where data will be copied.
Size of the buffer in bytes.

simplesect.para: Number of bytes read on success, negative value on error.

briefdescription.para: Clear all data stored in the NVS partition.

detaileddescription.para: Erases all key-value entries in the configured NVS area. Use with caution.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, negative value on error.

briefdescription.para: Get the current in-code version of the NVS layout.

detaileddescription.para: This version corresponds to the structure of data expected by the firmware.
Used to detect incompatibility between NVS layout and firmware logic.

briefdescription.para: Get the version stored in the NVS flash memory.

detaileddescription.para: Used to compare with the in-code version to validate compatibility.
